ca.foc.controller

Class MemberController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.foc.controller.MemberController

  • @RestController
public class MemberController
extends java.lang.Object
    Member controller - ca.foc.controller.MemberController Member Controller- invokes MemberService class to process member related tasks, and then redirects to the front end
    Author:
    Claudia Rivera, Mariia Voronina Implemented: Register(Create an account) Login Find members by Id (not in controller class documentation) Claudia. March/09/2020 Suggest a product View suggestions Edit profile Delete profile Claudia Rivera. March/21/2020 add products To Favorites delete from favourites getProducts in Favourites Change member role Mariia Voronina

      • findMember

        @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
 @GetMapping(value="/members/{email}")
 @ResponseBody
public MemberResponse findMember(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String email)
        Find a member by email
        Parameters:
        email - to identify the member
        Returns:
        a MemberResponse object with attributes: boolean isExist, String firstname, String lastname

      • addFavourite

        @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
 @PostMapping(value="/fav/{email}/{productId}/{regionId}/{coordinates}")
 @ResponseBody
public boolean addFavourite(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                                                     @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                     int productId,
                                                                                                                                                                     @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                     int regionId,
                                                                                                                                                                     @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String coordinates)
        Member add or delete a product in Favourite List. The product must have a unique identity given for: email, productId,regionId
        Parameters:
        email - to identify the member
        productId - to identify the product
        regionId - to identify the region
        coordinates - location of the product on the map
        Returns:
        boolean True if the product was added to the favourite list or false if the product was deleted

      • getProductsInFavourite

        @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
 @GetMapping(value="/favourites/{email}")
public java.util.List<FavouriteResponse> getProductsInFavourite(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String email)
        Returns all products in favourite table
        Parameters:
        email - identify the member
        Returns:
        list of products in the favourite list of member identified by email
